Movie_Cast: Anthony Hopkins, John Hurt, Anne Bancroft, John Gielgud
Movie_Des: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

Movie_Name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
Movie_Cast: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle, Terry Gilliam
Movie_Des: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

Movie_Cast: Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston, Perry Lopez
Movie_Des: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

Movie_Cast: Yves Montand, Irene Papas, Jean-Louis Trintignant, François Périer
Movie_Des: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

Movie_Cast: Steve McQueen, James Garner, Richard Attenborough, Charles Bronson
Movie_Des: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

Movie_Cast: Toshirô Mifune, Eijirô Tôno, Tatsuya Nakadai, Yôko Tsukasa
Movie_Des: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

Movie_Cast: Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis, Jack Lemmon, George Raft
Movie_Des: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

Movie_Cast: Victor Sjöström, Bibi Andersson, Ingrid Thulin, Gunnar Björnstrand
Movie_Des: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

Movie_Name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
Movie_Cast: William Holden, Alec Guinness, Jack Hawkins, Sessue Hayakawa
Movie_Des: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

Movie_Cast: Jean Servais, Carl Möhner, Robert Manuel, Janine Darcey
Movie_Des: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

Movie_Cast: Ray Milland, Grace Kelly, Robert Cummings, John Williams
Movie_Des: A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

Movie_Cast: Chishû Ryû, Chieko Higashiyama, Sô Yamamura, Setsuko Hara
Movie_Des: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

Movie_Cast: Yves Montand, Charles Vanel, Peter van Eyck, Folco Lulli
Movie_Des: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

Movie_Cast: Toshirô Mifune, Machiko Kyô, Masayuki Mori, Takashi Shimura
Movie_Des: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

Movie_Name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
Movie_Cast: Humphrey Bogart, Walter Huston, Tim Holt, Bruce Bennett
Movie_Des: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

Movie_Name: To Be or Not to Be
Movie_Cast: Carole Lombard, Jack Benny, Robert Stack, Felix Bressart
Movie_Des: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

Movie_Cast: Clark Gable, Vivien Leigh, Thomas Mitchell, Barbara O'Neil
Movie_Des: The manipulative daughter of a Georgia plantation owner conducts a turbulent romance with a roguish profiteer during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

Movie_Cast: Maria Falconetti, Eugene Silvain, André Berley, Maurice Schutz
Movie_Des: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

Movie_Cast: Buster Keaton, Marion Mack, Glen Cavender, Jim Farley
Movie_Des: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

Movie_Cast: Charles Chaplin, Mack Swain, Tom Murray, Henry Bergman
Movie_Des: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

Movie_Cast: Buster Keaton, Kathryn McGuire, Joe Keaton, Erwin Connelly
Movie_Des: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

Movie_Name: Portrait de la jeune fille en feu
Movie_Cast: Noémie Merlant, Adèle Haenel, Luàna Bajrami, Valeria Golino
Movie_Des: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

Movie_Cast: Sushant Singh Rajput, Sanjana Sanghi, Sahil Vaid, Saswata Chatterjee
Movie_Des: The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, whom she meets at a support group.

Movie_Cast: Taapsee Pannu, Amitabh Bachchan, Kirti Kulhari, Andrea Tariang
Movie_Des: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

Movie_Cast: Miyu Irino, Saori Hayami, Aoi Yûki, Kenshô Ono
Movie_Des: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

Movie_Des: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

Movie_Cast: Irrfan Khan, Konkona Sen Sharma, Neeraj Kabi, Sohum Shah

Movie_Cast: Mario Casas, Ana Wagener, Jose Coronado, Bárbara Lennie
Movie_Des: A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.

Movie_Cast: Richa Chadha, Sanjay Mishra, Vicky Kaushal, Pankaj Tripathi

Movie_Cast: Akshay Kumar, Nimrat Kaur, Kumud Mishra, Prakash Belawadi

Movie_Cast: Sushant Singh Rajput, Abhinay Raj Singh, Kiara Advani, Anupam Kher

Movie_Des: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

Movie_Des: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

Movie_Cast: Brie Larson, Jacob Tremblay, Sean Bridgers, Wendy Crewson
Movie_Des: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

Movie_Des: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.

Movie_Cast: Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Graham Norton, Rachel House
Movie_Des: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

Movie_Des: A hotel owner and landlord in a remote Turkish village deals with conflicts within his family and a tenant behind on his rent.

Movie_Cast: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Ramya Krishnan, Sathyaraj
Movie_Des: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

Movie_Cast: Akshay Kumar, Anupam Kher, Manoj Bajpayee, Jimmy Shergill
Movie_Des: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

Movie_Cast: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric, Adrien Brody
Movie_Des: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

Movie_Cast: Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike, Neil Patrick Harris, Tyler Perry
Movie_Des: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

Movie_Name: Ôkami kodomo no Ame to Yuki

Movie_Des: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

Movie_Cast: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Zoe Saldana

Movie_Cast: Daniel Brühl, Chris Hemsworth, Olivia Wilde, Alexandra Maria Lara
Movie_Des: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

Movie_Des: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

Movie_Cast: Rajat Barmecha, Ronit Roy, Manjot Singh, Ram Kapoor

Movie_Des: Story of 40-man Turkish task force who must defend a relay station.

Movie_Des: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

Movie_Cast: Sanjay Dutt, Arshad Warsi, Vidya Balan, Boman Irani
Movie_Des: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

Movie_Cast: Sanjay Dutt, Arshad Warsi, Gracy Singh, Boman Irani
Movie_Des: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.

Movie_Cast: Kang-ho Song, Kim Sang-kyung, Roe-ha Kim, Jae-ho Song
Movie_Des: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

Movie_Name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

Movie_Des: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

Movie_Cast: Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee

Movie_Cast: Aamir Khan, Saif Ali Khan, Akshaye Khanna, Preity Zinta

Movie_Cast: Aamir Khan, Naseeruddin Shah, Sonali Bendre, Mukesh Rishi
Movie_Des: After his brother is killed and father severely injured by terrorists, a young med student quits his studies to join the Indian Police Service to wipe out the terrorists.

Movie_Des: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

Movie_Des: At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.

Movie_Cast: Eli Marienthal, Harry Connick Jr., Jennifer Aniston, Vin Diesel
Movie_Des: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

Movie_Des: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.
